hu.akarnokd.rxjava3.jdk8interop

Class ObservableInterop

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.rxjava3.jdk8interop.ObservableInterop

  • public final class ObservableInterop
extends Object
    Utility methods, sources and operators supporting RxJava 2 and the Jdk 8 API interoperation.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Detail

      • fromStream

        public static <T> Observable<T> fromStream(Stream<T> stream)
        Wrap a Stream into a Observable.

        Note that Streams can only be consumed once and non-concurrently.

        The operator closes the stream. Exceptions thrown by Stream.close() are routed to the global RxJavaPlugins.onError handler.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        stream - the source Stream
        Returns:
        the new Observable instance

      • fromOptional

        public static <T> Observable<T> fromOptional(Optional<T> opt)
        Returns a Observable for the value (or lack of) in the given Optional.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        opt - the optional to wrap
        Returns:
        the new Observable instance

      • fromFuture

        public static <T> Observable<T> fromFuture(CompletionStage<T> cs)
        Create a Observable that signals the terminal value or error of the given CompletionStage.

        Cancelling the Observable subscription doesn't cancel the CompletionStage.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        cs - the CompletionStage instance
        Returns:
        the new Observable instance

      • collect

        public static <T,A,R> ObservableTransformer<T,R> collect(Collector<T,A,R> collector)
        Collect the elements of the Observable via the help of Collector and its callback functions.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the upstream value type
        A - the accumulated type
        R - the result type
        Parameters:
        collector - the Collector object providing the callbacks
        Returns:
        the Transformer instance to be used with Observable.compose()

      • first

        public static <T> ObservableConverter<T,CompletionStage<T>> first()
        Returns a CompletionStage that signals the first element of the Observable or a NoSuchElementException if the Observable is empty.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Returns:
        the converter function to be used via Observable.to.

      • single

        public static <T> ObservableConverter<T,CompletionStage<T>> single()
        Returns a CompletionStage that signals the single element of the Observable, IllegalArgumentException if the Observable is longer than 1 element or a NoSuchElementException if the Observable is empty.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Returns:
        the converter function to be used with Observable.to.

      • last

        public static <T> ObservableConverter<T,CompletionStage<T>> last()
        Returns a CompletionStage that emits the last element of the Observable or NoSuchElementException if the Observable is empty.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Returns:
        the converter function to be used with Observable.to.

      • toStream

        public static <T> ObservableConverter<T,Stream<T>> toStream()
        Returns a blocking Stream of the elements of the Observable.

        Closing the Stream will cancel the flow.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Returns:
        the converter function to be used with Observable.to.

      • firstElement

        public static <T> ObservableConverter<T,Optional<T>> firstElement()
        Block until the source Observable emits its first item and return that as Optional.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Returns:
        the converter Function to be used with Observable.to().

      • lastElement

        public static <T> ObservableConverter<T,Optional<T>> lastElement()
        Block until the source Observable completes and return its last value as Optional.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Returns:
        the converter Function to be used with Observable.to().

      • mapOptional

        public static <T,R> ObservableTransformer<T,R> mapOptional(Function<? super T,Optional<R>> mapper)
        Maps the upstream value into an optional and extracts its optional value to be emitted towards the downstream if present.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the upstream value type
        R - the result value type
        Parameters:
        mapper - the function receiving the upstream value and should return an Optional
        Returns:
        the Transformer instance to be used with Observable.compose()

      • flatMapStream

        public static <T,R> ObservableTransformer<T,R> flatMapStream(Function<? super T,? extends Stream<R>> mapper)
        Map each value of the upstream into a Stream and flatten them into a single sequence.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the input value type
        R - the Stream type
        Parameters:
        mapper - the function that returns a Stream for each upstream value
        Returns:
        the new Transformer instance
